typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(Rating = 5) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(Rating == 1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie'],
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
